00066 void ParameterFileReaderTest::testmethod_Read()
00067 {
00068         ParameterFileReader reader;
00069         ParameterFileData paramData;
00070         std::string name = TEST_DATA_FILE;
00071         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(reader.Read(name, paramData) == true);
00072 
00073     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(paramData.ParameterFileAttributes().company == L"Affymetrix");
00074     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(paramData.ParameterFileAttributes().userName == L"Srinivas");
00075     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(paramData.ParameterFileAttributes().contentVersion == L"1");
00076 
00077     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(paramData.ImplementationAttributes().name == L"Percentile Cell Average");
00078     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(paramData.ImplementationAttributes().version == L"0.1");
00079     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(paramData.ImplementationAttributes().executableFileName == L"percentile.exe");
00080     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(paramData.ImplementationAttributes().description == L"Percentile Average feature extraction algorithm for generating CEL files");
00081 
00082     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(paramData.Parameters().size() == 5);
00083 
00084     ParameterTypeList::iterator it;
00085     
00086     it = paramData.Parameters().begin();
00087 
00088     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->name==L"Percentile");
00089     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->displayName==L"Percentile");
00090     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->category==L"Percentile Parameters");
00091     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->isEditable==L"false");
00092     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->type==L"Int32");
00093     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->currentValue==L"75");
00094     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->minValue==L"0");
00095     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->maxValue==L"100");
00096     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->defaultValue==L"75");
00097     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->precision==L"0");
00098     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->maxLength==L"0");
00099     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->description==L"Percentile to use for cell intensity");
00100     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->index==L"-1");
00101 
00102     ++it;
00103 
00104     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->name==L"CellMargin");
00105     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->displayName==L"CellMargin");
00106     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->category==L"Percentile Parameters");
00107     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->isEditable==L"false");
00108     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->type==L"Int32");
00109     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->currentValue==L"2");
00110     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->minValue==L"0");
00111     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->maxValue==L"10");
00112     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->defaultValue==L"2");
00113     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->precision==L"0");
00114     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->maxLength==L"0");
00115     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->description==L"Cell Margin to use for cell intensity");
00116     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->index==L"-1");
00117 
00118     ++it;
00119 
00120     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->name==L"CellFileVersion");
00121     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->displayName==L"CellFileVersion");
00122     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->category==L"Percentile Parameters");
00123     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->isEditable==L"false");
00124     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->type==L"Int32");
00125     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->currentValue==L"3");
00126     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->minValue==L"3");
00127     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->maxValue==L"3");
00128     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->defaultValue==L"3");
00129     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->precision==L"0");
00130     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->maxLength==L"0");
00131     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->description==L"Version of Cell file to write");
00132     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->index==L"-1");
00133 
00134     ++it;
00135 
00136     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->name==L"OutlierLow");
00137     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->displayName==L"OutlierLow");
00138     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->category==L"Outlier Parameters");
00139     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->isEditable==L"false");
00140     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->type==L"Float");
00141     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->currentValue==L"1.004");
00142     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->minValue==L"1.004");
00143     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->maxValue==L"1.004");
00144     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->defaultValue==L"1.004");
00145     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->precision==L"3");
00146     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->maxLength==L"0");
00147     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->description==L"Outlier threshold low");
00148     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->index==L"-1");
00149 
00150     ++it;
00151 
00152     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->name==L"OutlierHigh");
00153     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->displayName==L"OutlierHigh");
00154     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->category==L"Outlier Parameters");
00155     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->isEditable==L"false");
00156     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->type==L"Float");
00157     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->currentValue==L"1.5");
00158     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->minValue==L"1.5");
00159     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->maxValue==L"1.5");
00160     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->defaultValue==L"1.5");
00161     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->precision==L"1");
00162     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->maxLength==L"0");
00163     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->description==L"Outlier threshold high");
00164     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(it->index==L"-1");
00165 
00166 }
00167 
00168 void ParameterFileReaderTest::testmethod_Read_when_file_does_not_exist()
00169 {
00170         ParameterFileReader reader;
00171         ParameterFileData paramData;
00172         std::string name = TEST_NON_EXISTANT_FILE;
00173         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(reader.Read(name, paramData) == false);
00174 }
